objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#f5e8dd'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><g opacity='0.3'><rect x='100' y='100' width='880' height='880' rx='10' stroke='#d4a982' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><rect x='50' y='50' width='980' height='980' rx='10' stroke='#d4a982' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/></g><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='350' fill='#d4a982' opacity='0.05'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='#d4a982' opacity='0.07'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='250' fill='#d4a982' opacity='0.09'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='200' fill='#d4a982' opacity='0.12'/><path d='M0 800 C 200 780, 400 820, 600 800 S 900 770, 1080 790 L 1080 1080 L 0 1080 Z' fill='#c69c6d' opacity='0.2'/><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1080' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#e8d8ca'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#f5e8dd'/></linearGradient></defs></svg>

objects.text: Faux Leather | Spacious Design | Everyday Elegance
Dimension: 10.9" L x 4" W x 12.4" H | Perfect Medium Size

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner features a high-end product promotion layout ideal for fashion branding. At the top, the brand name (`brand`) is prominently displayed in bold uppercase typography, immediately establishing identity. Beneath it, the product title (`heading`) is elegantly styled, hinting at sophistication. Central to the banner is a high-resolution product image (`product_image`), framed by subtle concentric circles and gradient tones, enhancing visual focus. Supporting text sections like `tagline` and `description` emphasize features and dimensions for persuasive detail. A large price label (`price`) is boldly placed, followed by a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with inviting text (`cta`). The layout is symmetrical and clean with premium aesthetics.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: `#e8d8ca` to `#f5e8dd`
- Accent Gold Brown: `#d4a982`
- Highlight Brown: `#c69c6d`, `#9a7654`
- Text Dark Brown: `#614832`
- CTA Button: `#9a7654`
- CTA Text: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish handbag in a rich, warm camel brown color (#A97463), which dominates the palette with an elegant and understated appeal. The leather texture subtly reflects light, adding depth while maintaining a matte look. Accents in metallic gold (#D4AF37), found on the hardware, branding, and decorative charms, add luxury and shine, creating a striking contrast against the matte body. The visual harmony between the soft brown and shimmering gold elements enhances refinement. For banner design, complementing tones like warm beige (#E8D8C3), deep taupe (#7C5C52), and ivory (#F8F5F0) can be used to preserve elegance and cohesion.
